hero.description: I turn ideas into AI-powered social impact products, prioritizing accessible design and measurable results.
hero.secondaryDescription: Specializing in rapid prototyping and MVPs for agile idea validation.

about.title: About
about.description: I build social-impact products connecting neighbors, local shops and couriers. I move between code, design and strategy to ship simple, useful, measurable solutions.
about.howIWorkDescription:
Discovery → Prototype → MVP → Production, usability & metrics first.
Futuristic yet professional visuals (animations/parallax) with accessibility and reduced motion support.
Bilingüe ES/EN; content and structure SEO-ready.
idealClientsList: Social-impact startups/SMBs, last-mile logistics, local retail, community/economy projects.
Teams needing a fast MVP aimed at real-world adoption.
servicesList: Systems with maps, last-mile logistics, notifications and auth.
Product and UX/UI end-to-end, local GTM, i18n/SEO.
MVPs of DAO/tokenomics applied to real economy.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Specialized in building innovative and efficient solutions with social impact.

projects.title: Highlight projects
projects.description: Discover my work in social impact solutions.

project1.title: Bajo Flores
project1.what: Local social-impact platform: ride hailing, delivery, neighborhood news.
project1.problem: Logistics/services don’t properly reach underserved areas.
project1.solution: App connecting neighbors, local shops and couriers with Maps/GPS and push.
project1.gtm: Local GTM: radio, flyers, real testers.

project2.title: KDT
project2.what: DAO platform with tokenomics to align incentives among couriers and clients.
project2.role: Governance design + dual app + metrics; L2 exploration for tokens/payments.

project3.title: SudOne
project3.what: Sports and digital collectibles platform: leagues, rankings, and card marketplace.
project3.problem: Amateur leagues and players lack a unified digital space to organize competitions, track performance, and gamify the experience.
project3.solution: Web application with tournament management, dynamic player rankings ('SudPoints'), user profiles, and a marketplace for digital collectible cards.
project3.goal: To unify sports tournaments and digital collectibles into a scalable and gamified ecosystem.

project4.title: FM 88.1
project4.problem: The radio station needs a modern and accessible web presence.
project4.solution: A web app with live streaming, show schedules, and news.
project4.goal: To create a user-friendly and engaging online experience for the radio's listeners.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
contact.formDescription: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contactSuccess.title: Message Sent
